title: DTNA Portal
text: DTNA Portal Welcome to DTNA Portal, the starting point for working with all brands and franchises that fall under the Daimler Truck North America umbrella. Whether you use DTNA's online resources to complete repairs, purchase parts, submit warranty claims, spec new vehicles or track the status of your vehicle orders, DTNA Portal offers customization and personalization to streamline your daily tasks and activities. - Detroit Glove Box Material - Detroit Warranty Booklets - Driver Info/Aids - Driverâ€™s and Maintenance Manuals (TechLit) - eComponents (electrical components site) - Emergency Response Guides - Engineering Documents - access requires Login ID and Password - Lubricants, Fuels & Coolants - Spec Manager - Vehicle Recall Look-Up - Service Tracker For technical issues with DTNA Portal or other DTNA applications, contact the DTNA Software Support Center. 855-639-8680 SoftwareSupport@DaimlerTruck.com For More Details or Product Concerns, Click Here
